Methods

CalculateGroupBounds(Graph, string, double?, double, double, double)

Calculates the bounding box of a group based on its children.

public static (Point topLeft, double width, double height) CalculateGroupBounds(this Graph graph, string groupId, double? padding = null, double headerHeight = 30, double defaultNodeWidth = 150, double defaultNodeHeight = 80)

Parameters

graph Graph

The graph containing the group.

groupId string

The group ID.

padding double?

Padding around children. If null, uses the group's GroupPadding property or GroupPadding.

headerHeight double

Height of group header. Defaults to GroupHeaderHeight.

defaultNodeWidth double

Default node width. Defaults to NodeWidth.

defaultNodeHeight double

Default node height. Defaults to NodeHeight.

Returns

(Point topLeft, double width, double height)
